message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay that much for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I'm still not convinced that $17,000 is a good price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll offer $13,500 for the product.
